messages.content: I'm sorry, but I do not have any information about a person named "Niko De Bruyne". Can you provide more context or details about who this person is?

Kevin De Bruyne is a Belgian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Manchester City and the Belgium national team. He is widely considered as one of the best midfielders in the world and is known for his vision, passing ability, and long-range shooting. De Bruyne has won numerous individual awards such as the Premier League Playmaker of the Season, UEFA Europa League Squad of the Season, and the FIFA FIFPro World XI. He has also helped Manchester City win several domestic and international titles, including the Premier League, FA Cup, and Carabao Cup.
